verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>. Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> that feareth <WH3372> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, that delighteth <WH2654> <WH8804> greatly <WH3966> in his Mitzvot <WH4687>.
His seed <WH2233> shall be mighty <WH1368> upon earth <WH776>: the generation <WH1755> of the upright <WH3477> shall be blessed <WH1288> <WH8792>.
Wealth <WH1952> and riches <WH6239> shall be in his house <WH1004>: and his righteousness <WH6666> endureth <WH5975> <WH8802> for ever <WH5703>.
Unto the upright <WH3477> there ariseht <WH2224> <WH8804> light <WH216> in the darkness <WH2822>: he is gracious <WH2587>, and full of compassion <WH7349>, and righteous <WH6662>.
A good <WH2896> man <WH376> sheweth favour <WH2603> <WH8802>, and lendeth <WH3867> <WH8688>: he will guide <WH3557> <WH8770> his affairs <WH1697> with discretion <WH4941>.
Surely he shall not be moved <WH4131> <WH8735> for ever <WH5769>: the righteous <WH6662> shall be in everlasting <WH5769> remembrance <WH2143>.
He shall not be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of evil <WH7451> tidings <WH8052>: his heart <WH3820> is fixed <WH3559> <WH8737>, trusting <WH982> <WH8803> in the YY <WH3068>.
His heart <WH3820> is established <WH5564> <WH8803>, he shall not be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>, until he see <WH7200> <WH8799> his desire upon his enemies <WH6862>.

He hath dispersed <WH6340> <WH8765>, he hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> to the poor <WH34>; his righteousness <WH6666> endureth <WH5975> <WH8802> for ever <WH5703>; his shofar <WH7161> shall be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799> with honour <WH3519>.

The wicked <WH7563> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and be grieved <WH3707> <WH8804>; he shall gnash <WH2786> <WH8799> with his teeth <WH8127>, and melt away <WH4549> <WH8738>: the desire <WH8378> of the wicked <WH7563> shall perish <WH6> <WH8799>.
